backend/main.mo: Defines all core data types for perks, characters, builds, matches, news, and user data, plus helper modules for storing match history and favorites using List conversions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping implemented features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, defines all main routes, and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the global layout with header, navigation, background, auth controls, and optional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/Auth/AuthGate.ts: Displays a login-required screen for unauthenticated users and renders children only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading and error-recovery logic.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal for users to enter and save their display name using a profile save mutation.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state component showing an icon, title, optional description, and optional action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the authenticated user's profile through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching and mutation hooks for characters, perks, news, wiki entries, and user data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BuildPlannerPage.tsx: Build planner UI allowing users to create, edit, and delete builds tied to their saved user data.
frontend/src/pages/CharactersPage.tsx: Characters listing page with search, role filters, and ability to favorite characters.
frontend/src/pages/MatchTrackerPage.tsx: Page for viewing, adding, and deleting match history entries using user data and character lists.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays searchable news items with selectable detail view and category badges.
frontend/src/pages/PerksPage.tsx: Lists all perks with search, detail view, and ability to favorite perks tied to user data.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile info and stats with links to builds and match history.
frontend/src/pages/WikiPage.tsx: Displays searchable wiki entries and shows selected entry details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app scope, architecture, features, and image requirements for a Dead by Daylight companion app.
